description.value:
When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] while wielding your staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any Athletics check required and add 5 feet to the distance you can Leap vertically and horizontally. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] even if you don't have a free hand, provided you are wielding your staff. Finally, when you roll a success on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] while wielding your staff, you get a critical success instead.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.BRxlFHXu8tN14TDI]{Staff Acrobat} archetype.

value.value: trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as "your staff")

source.value: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
